This page describes which packages and configuration files need to be installed on Ubuntu for Lao to be supported.

For other languages, see DapperL10nSprint.

=== Fontconfig Configuration ===

* The Lao fonts need a similar config to Thai. [WIP]

=== Fonts used ===

* ttf-lao
* There are other non-free Lao fonts, all non-free
* http://www.geocities.com/jglavy/asian.html and http://jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/laos.html have useful info.

* ?

=== SCIM input method ===

* To input Lao you need a Lao keyboard.
* gtk-im-extra includes an IM for Lao.
